Peter Parker is beset with troubles in his failing personal life as he battles a brilliant scientist named Doctor Otto Octavius, who becomes Doctor Octopus (aka Doc Ock), after an accident causes him to bond psychically with mechanical tentacles that do his bidding.
A hard-living superhero who has fallen out of favor with the public enters into a questionable relationship with the wife of the public relations professional who's trying to repair his image.
A young woman discovers her visiting "Uncle Charlie" may not be the man he seems to be.
Disgruntled Korean War vet Walt Kowalski sets out to reform his neighbor, a young Hmong teenager, who tried to steal Kowalski's prized possession: his 1972 Gran Torino.
A fast track lawyer can't lie for 24 hours due to his son's birthday wish after the lawyer turns his son down for the last time.
A marshall, personally compelled to face a returning deadly enemy, finds that his own town refuses to help him.
A medical student in the 70's that treated patients, illegally, using humor.

film.titre: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs
film.resume: The most delicious event since macaroni met cheese. Inspired by the beloved children's book, the film focuses on a town where food falls from the sky like rain. |
Holed up in Bruges, Belgium after a difficult job, two hit men begin to differ on their views of life and death as they become used to local customs.
Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.
Based on the Marvel character, stunt motorcyclist Johnny Blaze gives up his soul to become a hellblazing vigilante, to fight against power hungry Blackheart, the son of the devil himself.
A naive young woman comes to New York and scores a job as the assistant to one of the city's biggest magazine editors, the ruthless and cynical Miranda Priestly.
The two best hired guns in the West must save President Grant from the clutches of a 19th century inventor-villain.
Set during the Ice Age, a sabertooth tiger, a sloth, and a wooly mammoth find a lost human infant, and they try to return him to his tribe.
In the fascist Spain of 1944, the bookish young stepdaughter of a sadistic army officer escapes into an eerie but captivating fantasy world.
Archeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones is hired by the US government to find the Ark of the Covenant before the Nazis.
John Rambo is removed from prison by his former superior, Colonel Samuel Troutman, for a top-secret...

In future Britain, charismatic delinquent Alex DeLarge is jailed and later volunteers for an experimental aversion therapy developed by the government in an effort to solve society's crime problem... but not all goes to plan.
New York cop John McClane gives terrorists a dose of their own medicine as they hold hostages in an LA office building.

role.personnage: Deputy Police Chief Dwayne T. Robinson

film.resume: Bruce Banner, a genetics researcher with a tragic past, suffers an accident that causes him to transform into a raging green monster when he gets angry.
Batman must battle Two-Face and The Riddler with help of an amourous psychologist and a young circus acrobat who becomes his sidekick, Robin.
The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.
A family living on a farm finds mysterious crop circles in their fields which suggests something more frightening to come.
Horton the Elephant struggles to protect a microscopic community from his neighbors who refuse to believe it exists.
The cross-country adventures of two good-hearted but incredibly stupid friends.

film.titre: I Now Pronounce You Chuck & Larry
film.resume: Two straight, single Brooklyn firefighters pretend to be a gay couple in order to receive domestic partner benefits. |

film.titre: The Mummy: Tomb of the Dragon Emperor
film.resume: In the Far East, Alex O'Connell, the son of famed mummy fighters Rick and Evy O'Connell, unearths the mummy of the first Emperor of Qin -- a shape-shifting entity cursed by a witch centuries ago.
The X-Men band together to find a mutant assassin who has made an attempt on the President's life, while the Mutant Academy is attacked by military forces.
The story of a bride-to-be trying to find her real father told using hit songs by the popular '70s group ABBA.
When Apollo Creed is killed in a match against a powerful Soviet boxer, Rocky decides to challenge him himself.
Bonds of loyalty are put to the test when a hitman's son witnesses what his father does for a living.
A film crew goes to a tropical island for an exotic location shoot and discovers a colossal giant gorilla who takes a shine to their female blonde star.

role.personnage: The Eighth Wonder of the World

film.resume: A Polish Jewish musician struggles to survive the destruction of the Warsaw ghetto of World War II.

film.titre: Once Upon a Time in America
film.resume: A former Prohibition-era Jewish gangster returns to Brooklyn over 30 years later, where he once again must confront the ghosts and regrets of his old life.
A guy who complains about God too often is given almighty powers to teach him how difficult it is to run the world.
A socially awkward but very bright 15-year-old girl being raised by a single mom discovers that she...
A human-looking, apparently unstoppable cyborg is sent from the future to kill Sarah Connor; Kyle Reese is sent to stop it.
A FedEx executive must transform himself physically and emotionally to survive a crash landing on a deserted island.

Diego, Manny and Sid return in this sequel to the hit Ice Age. This time around the Ice Age is over and is starting to melt, which will destroy their valley. So they must unite and warn everyone about the situation.
Professional assassin Leon reluctantly takes care of 12-year-old Mathilda, a neighbor whose parents are killed, and teaches her his trade.
An ingenue insinuates herself in to the company of an established but aging stage actress and her circle of theater friends.
After an accident, a chauvenistic executive gains the ability to hear what women are really thinking.
A struggling salesman takes custody of his son as he's poised to begin a life-changing professional endeavor.
Three unemployed parapsychology professors set up shop as a unique ghost removal service.
A group of misfits enter a Las Vegas dodgeball tournament in order to save their cherished local gym from the onslaught of a corporate health fitness chain.
Philo Beddoe is an easy-going trucker and a great fist-fighter. With two friends - Orville, who promotes prize-fights for him...
In a future world devastated by disease, a convict is sent back in time to gather information about the man-made virus that wiped out most of the human population on the planet.
When a worldly singer witnesses a mob crime, the police hide her as a nun in a traditional convent where she has trouble fitting in.

A man decides to turn his moribund life around by winning back his ex-girlfriend, reconciling his relationship with his mother, and dealing with an entire community that has returned from the dead to eat the living.
A dissenting juror in a murder trial slowly manages to convince the others that the case is not as obviously clear as it seemed in court.
A young woman with a white trash background runs away from her husband in Alabama and reinvents herself as a New York socialite.
An unorthodox and irreverent DJ begins to shake up things when he is assigned to the US Armed Services Radio station in Vietnam.
A distant poor relative of the Duke of D'Ascoyne plots to inherit the title by murdering the eight other heirs who stand ahead of him in the line of succession.
An emotionally self-destructive boxer's journey through life, as the violence and temper that leads him to the top in the ring, destroys his life outside it.
Retired Old West gunslinger William Munny reluctantly takes on one last job, with the help of his old partner and a young man.
A carefree girl is sold to a traveling entertainer, consequently enduring physical and emotional pain along the way.
An angel helps a compassionate but despairingly frustrated businessman by showing what life would have been like if he never existed.
In 1930s Chicago, a young con man seeking revenge for his murdered partner teams up with a master of the big con to win a fortune from a criminal banker.

film.titre: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
film.resume: With their warning about Lord Voldemort's return scoffed at, Harry and Dumbledore are targeted by the Wizard authorities as an authoritarian bureaucrat slowly seizes power at Hogwarts.
Hijackers seize the plane carrying the President of the United States and his family, but he (an ex-soldier) works from hiding to defeat them.
Carmen's caught in a virtual reality game designed by the Kids' new nemesis, the Toymaker (Stallone). It's up to Juni to save his sister, and ultimately the world.
With a childhood tragedy that overshadowed their lives, three men are reunited by circumstance when one loses a daughter.

film.titre: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
film.resume: Rescued from the outrageous neglect of his aunt and uncle, a young boy with a great destiny proves his worth while attending Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

role.personnage: He Who Must Not Be Named

film.resume: When two kids play an old magic board-game they found, they release a man trapped for decades in it and a host of dangers that can only be stopped by finishing the game.
God contacts Congressman Evan Baxter and tells him to build an ark in preparation for a great flood.
After an attempted assassination on Ambassador Han, Lee and Carter head to Paris to protect a French woman with knowledge of the Triads' secret leaders.
The Dark Knight of Gotham City begins his war on crime with his first major enemy being the clownishly homicidal Joker.

film.titre: Interview with the Vampire: The Vampire Chronicles
film.resume: A vampire tells his epic life story: love, betrayal, loneliness, and hunger.
In 1948, an American court in occupied Germany tries four Nazi judges for war crimes.

film.titre: Austin Powers: The Spy Who Shagged Me
film.resume: Dr. Evil is back...and has invented a new time machine that allows him to go back to the 60's and steal Austin Powers's mojo, inadvertently leaving him "shagless".
Will Hunting, a janitor at MIT, has a gift for mathematics but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life.
The Angels investigate a series of murders that occur after the theft of a witness protection profile database. Their prime suspects? A "fallen angel" who was once their ally and the Creepy Thin Man.
When wealthy industrialist Tony Stark is forced to build an armored suit after a life-threatening incident, he ultimately decides to use its technology to fight against evil.
Xander Cage is an extreme sports athelete recruited by the government on a special mission.
With his wife doing a book tour, a father of twelve must handle a new job and his unstable brood.
Reunited by the death of a college friend, three divorced women seek revenge on the husbands who left them for younger women.
A divorced New Yorker currently dating a high-schooler brings himself to look for love in the mistress of his best friend instead.
A football team water boy discovers he has a unique tackling ability and becomes a member of the team.
A mid-life crisis plagued man and his friends find renewal and purpose on a cattle driving vacation.
A married man's one night stand comes back to haunt him when that lover begins to stalk him and his family.
In this live-action feature of the cartoon show, Fred Flintstone finally gets the job he's always wanted, but it may just come at a price.
Renton, deeply immersed in the Edinburgh drug scene, tries to clean up and get out, despite the allure of the drugs and influence of friends.
A year after disposing the body of a man they accidently killed, a group of dumb teenagers are stalked by a bumbling serial killer.
A successful publisher finds his life taking a turn for the surreal after a car accident with a jaded lover.

The third film in the American Pie series deals with the wedding of Jim and Michelle and the gathering of their families and friends, including Jim's old friends from high school and Michelle's little sister.
An in-depth examination of the way that the Vietnam war affects the lives of people in a small industrial town in the USA.
An ordinary man sees a bright light descend from the sky, and discovers he now has super-intelligence and telekinesis.
An American nurse living and working in Tokyo is exposed to a mysterious supernatural curse, one that locks a person in a powerful rage before claiming their life and spreading to another victim.
Batman, Gordon and Harvey Dent are forced to deal with the chaos unleashed by an anarchist mastermind known only as the Joker, as it drives each of them to their limits.
The story of Michael Oher, an homeless and traumatized boy who became an All American football player and first round NFL draft pick with the help of a caring woman and her family.
After moving into a suburban home, a couple becomes increasingly disturbed by a nightly demonic presence.
In the Valley of Peace, Po the Panda finds himself chosen as the Dragon Warrior despite the fact that he is obese and a complete novice at martial arts.
A film detailing the final hours and crucifixion of Jesus Christ.
A family determined to get their young daughter into the finals of a beauty pageant take a cross-country trip in their VW bus.
A pragmatic U.S. Marine observes the dehumanizing effects the Vietnam War has on his fellow Marine recruits from their brutal basic training to the bloody street fighting set in 1968 Hue, Vietnam.
A true story about Frank Abagnale Jr. who, before his 19th birthday, successfully conned millions of dollars worth of checks as a Pan Am pilot, doctor, and legal prosecutor.
A San Francisco detective suffering from acrophobia investigates the strange activities of an old friend's wife, all the while becoming dangerously obsessed with her.
When a secret agent learns of his wife's extra-marital affair, he pursues her and uses his intelligence resources in a job he kept secret from her.
The incredible story of Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart, told in flashback mode by Antonio Salieri - now confined to an insane asylum.
In the distant future, a small waste collecting robot inadvertently embarks on a space journey that will ultimately decide the fate of mankind.
After inadvertently wreaking havoc on the elf community due to his ungainly size, a man raised as an elf at the North Pole is sent to the U.S. in search of his true identity.
